description.ko: 거대한 유리 구조물과 빛나는 광고판이 지평선을 장식하는 거대한 사이버펑크 대도시의 숨막히는 전경입니다. NEON-V 미학은 짙은 그림자와 선명하고 포화된 빛 사이의 날카로운 대비를 강조합니다.
description.en: A breathtaking view of a sprawling cyberpunk metropolis, where towering glass structures and glowing advertisements define the horizon. The NEON-V aesthetic emphasizes the sharp contrast between deep shadows and brilliant, saturated light.

prompt: Futuristic cyberpunk cityscape, NEON-V style, vibrant neon glows in electric blue and magenta, hyper-detailed skyscrapers with holographic advertisements, flying vehicles weaving through vertical canyons, rain-slicked streets with high-contrast reflections, synthwave aesthetic, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, dense atmosphere
